description: The Turing Pi 2.5 is an updated version of the Turing Pi 2.0, a 4-node mini ITX cluster board compatible with Raspberry Pi CM4 modules and Nvidia Jetson modules. This compact device is designed for applications such as building Homelabs, self-hosting, and machine learning tasks, as it is capable of continuous 24/7 operation. The Turing […]
title: Turing Pi 2.5 4-Node Mini-ITX Cluster Board Receives Hardware Upgrades
